channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: South Sudanese army officer and soldiers arrested over death of UN staff member
item.description: A United Nations staff member has been found dead in South Sudan after being taken into custody by security personnel

item.title: Advocates raise alarms after Wisconsin judge Hannah Dugan found guilty of obstruction
item.description: Defenders of a Wisconsin judge found guilty of felony obstruction for helping a Mexican immigrant evade federal officers are raising alarms about judi...

item.title: Soldier to appear before military judge on charges that he shot 5 people at a base
item.description: An Army sergeant charged with attempted murder in the shootings of five people at a Georgia base faces arraignment before a military judge

item.title: California school district near Nevada caught up in a dispute over transgender athlete policies
item.description: A Northern California school district near the state's border with Nevada is caught up in a dispute over the states' differing policies on the partici...

item.title: Church repatriates sacred rock covered with petroglyphs after 14-year effort
item.description: A rock covered with petroglyphs created centuries ago by the ancestors of the Northwestern Band of the Shoshone Nation is back home in the mountains o...
